allow: Bash(scp -r backend client data music_library.json Dockerfile docker-compose.yml package.json .dockerignore root@69.62.108.82:/opt/impro-manager/)

Bash(ssh root@69.62.108.82 "cat > /opt/scripts/mount-dropbox-music.sh <<''EOF''
#!/bin/bash
rclone mount ''dropbox:JULIEN/Zic Impro'' /opt/impro-manager/music \
  --daemon \
  --vfs-cache-mode writes \
  --vfs-cache-max-age 24h \
  --vfs-cache-max-size 2G \
  --allow-other \
  --log-file /var/log/rclone-music.log
EOF")

Bash(ssh root@69.62.108.82 "mkdir -p /opt/scripts && cat > /opt/scripts/mount-dropbox-music.sh <<''EOF''
#!/bin/bash
rclone mount ''dropbox:JULIEN/Zic Impro'' /opt/impro-manager/music \
  --daemon \
  --vfs-cache-mode writes \
  --vfs-cache-max-age 24h \
  --vfs-cache-max-size 2G \
  --allow-other \
  --log-file /var/log/rclone-music.log
EOF")

Bash(ssh root@69.62.108.82 "cat > /etc/systemd/system/rclone-music-mount.service <<''EOF''
[Unit]
Description=Rclone mount for Dropbox music
After=network-online.target
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=simple
ExecStart=/opt/scripts/mount-dropbox-music.sh
ExecStop=/bin/fusermount -u /opt/impro-manager/music
Restart=on-failure
User=root

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF")
Bash(ssh root@69.62.108.82 "systemctl daemon-reload && systemctl enable rclone-music-mount && systemctl start rclone-music-mount")

Bash(ssh root@69.62.108.82 "cat > /opt/scripts/mount-dropbox-music.sh <<''EOF''
#!/bin/bash
exec rclone mount ''dropbox:JULIEN/Zic Impro'' /opt/impro-manager/music \
  --vfs-cache-mode writes \
  --vfs-cache-max-age 24h \
  --vfs-cache-max-size 2G \
  --allow-other \
  --log-file /var/log/rclone-music.log \
  --log-level INFO
EOF")
Bash(ssh root@69.62.108.82 "systemctl daemon-reload && systemctl restart rclone-music-mount && sleep 3 && systemctl status rclone-music-mount")
Bash(ssh root@69.62.108.82 "systemctl stop rclone-music-mount && systemctl disable rclone-music-mount")
